name: Circle Game (joshgibsongames)
description:
Welcome to Circle Game!

HOW TO RUN:

- extract the download to wherever you want to place it

- Click on CircleGame.jar

HOW TO PLAY:

- Opening the game will play the scenario automatically

- Edit options.txt to change some cool settings around 

(Please refer to IMPORTANT_INFO.txt about editing options.txt)

CONTROLS:

- ESC: Pause the game

- Q: End the scenario

This is just a little simulation thing I made a while ago that I finally decided to post. It's not as much a game as it is just a simulation, where you set up some settings and watch the balls bounce around. There are some useful files such as README.txt and IMPORTANT_INFO.txt to help you with editing the options and running the game.
